title: Start
body:
<<detachFrom Renata Mia>>
<<moveToX Renata Mia -15 40>>
<<moveToY Renata Mia 0 40>>
Mia: ...
Mia: What is this place?
Renata: It looks so....old.
Renata: Could this be where Roundier Haia was going?
Mia: Could this be where the person from that note was escaping from?
Renata: Let's see if we can get in.
<<attachTo Renata Mia>>
